system.availability: [Addictive] Lasts 1d10 Rounds, allows user to reroll any Focus Power Tests made during this time. However even Fettered Powers can trigger Psychic Phenomena as if Unfettered. User must also make -10 Willpower Test or gain 1 Corruption Point (source: failiure) when using power.
system.cost: Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -10 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.
